item.title: Cyberpunk 2077 Has a Slam Dunk Spin-Off Sitting Right Under its Nose
item.description:
Cyberpunk 2077 has been able to rise from its rocky launch and become one of the most beloved modern RPGs around. Thanks to the hard work of developer CD Projekt Red, the post-launch life of Cyberpunk 2077 has been incredibly successful, eventually leading to a sequel being greenlit. Now with the secretive sequel in its early stages of development, many are wondering when the next dose of Cyberpunk 2077 will be ready.

Unfortunately, it's likely to be a while before Cyberpunk 2077 's sequel, currently known as Project Orion , is finished. CD Projekt Red is also working on The Witcher 4 , which is likely to arrive first. The Cyberpunk 2077 universe is filled with fascinating points of lore to explore, which makes the prospect of Project Orion that much more exciting. However, when it comes to potential spin-off games, Netflix's animated Cyberpunk: Edgerunners series could be the perfect template for a new story.

A Cyberpunk: Edgerunners Spin-Off Game Could Be the Best Appetizer For Project Orion

Putting a Twist On the Cyberpunk 2077 Formula

While Project Orion is bound to adhere to similar gameplay and mechanics found in its predecessor, Edgerunners presents the opportunity to tell a story within the world that isn't confined to the first game's realistic visuals. Edgerunners ' anime art style showcased the franchise in a brand-new light, and keeping this same aesthetic for a game spin-off could potentially offer something both visually stunning and action-packed.

Edgerunners follows main character David Martinez, who becomes the titular "edgerunner" after having his life shaken by a drive-by shooting.

What Would an Edgerunners-Inspired Game Look Like?

Instead of being a first-person RPG, an Edgerunners chapter may work better as a shorter, third-person linear narrative. Edgerunners protagonist David would be unlikely as a protagonist, as revisiting his story would be repetitive for those who watched the mini-series, but a brand-new character living the same lifestyle might be just as compelling. Of course, it could also potentially be connected to the series and David in some small way. Whether it be a story following Lucy in the aftermath of David's showdown with Adam Smasher or a fresh character who knows about David's stand against Night City's corporate world and looks to him as a hero, such a spin-off is filled with possibilities.

Of course, it's important to mention that no such spin-off game has been confirmed, but if CD Projekt Red were to entertain such an idea, it could prove to be one of the strongest ways for the franchise to explore a new story in an unexpected way ahead of Project Orion .

Edgerunners presents the opportunity to tell a story within the world that isn't confined to the first game's realistic visuals.

Although the developer had no major releases in 2024, it turned out to be CD Projekt Red's third-best year, thanks to sales of Cyberpunk 2077 and its DLC, Phantom Liberty . Cyberpunk 2077 has now sold over 30 million copies.

Edgerunners and Project Orion Could Expand the Game's World in the Same Way

  • At the end of Edgerunners , Lucy travels to the moon.
  • Theories have suggested that Project Orion could finally feature the moon colony.

After leaks suggested that a moon-based DLC for Cyberpunk 2077 was canceled, many have speculated that this rumored expansion might be saved for Project Orion . If that's the case, then Project Orion and Edgerunners could share a compelling connection. This remains to be seen, but if an Edgerunners game spin-off didn't happen, having Easter eggs in Project Orion on the moon colony may be the next best thing.

As time passes, CD Projekt Red will reveal more insight into what else the developer has planned for the Cyberpunk 2077 franchise. Despite its controversial beginnings, Cyberpunk 2077 has proven to be a huge success for the developer, and it will be exciting to see what else lies on the horizon for Night City and its inhabitants.

item.title: 7 Biggest Weapons In Elden Ring, Ranked
item.description:
Summary

  • Elden Ring offers a variety of colossal weapons for pure Strength builds, boasting high damage values, enormous weight, and oversized appearances.
  • Weapons like the Fallingstar Beast Jaw and Ancient Meteoric Ore Greatsword provide incredible reach with heavy hits.
  • From the Giant-Crusher to the Prelate's Inferno Crozier, Elden Ring' s biggest weapons offer unique designs, at times echoing iconic weapons from previous FromSoftware soulslikes.

Starting with Demon's Souls , colossal oversized weapons have long been a staple in FromSoftware's soulslikes and a popular choice among players for pure Strength builds. Elden Ring is no exception. After all, why reinvent the wheel when one can just find a bigger weapon and go smash enemies and bosses? The game offers plenty of massive weapons for fans of such armaments, most of which fall into the Colossal Weapons category. These are among the heaviest gear available, boasting ridiculously high damage values. Naturally, the extreme physical damage these huge weapons provide comes with some drawbacks.

First, Elden Ring players need enough Strength just to equip them, along with enough Stamina to handle their hefty swings, which don't come cheap. On top of that, many comically oversized weapons can even block the player's view, making it hard to see what's happening in front of them and almost impossible to fight in tight spaces. Below, we'll rank the biggest weapons in Elden Ring and its expansion, Shadow of the Erdtree , based solely on their size.

For this ranking, biggest does not always mean heaviest. Weapons are ranked not by weight or other stats but rather by their appearance when wielded.

7 Ancient Meteoric Ore Greatsword

Hardly a Sword, But Rather a Chunk of Black Ore

  • Weight: 22.0
  • Strength requirements: 35
  • Two-handed: 23

The Ancient Meteoric Ore Greatsword is one of the largest new weapons introduced in the Shadow of the Erdtree expansion and is quite a looker. This colossal greatsword appears like a solid chunk of pitch-black ore, only vaguely resembling a sword with its pointed, somewhat triangular shape. Almost futuristic in design, the Ancient Meteoric Ore Greatsword suits Str/Arc builds, adding magical damage to each swing, and is among the heaviest weapons in its category.

To obtain the Ancient Meteoric Ore Greatsword, players need to carefully explore the Ruined Forge of Starfall Past in the Scadu Altus region. The sword rests on a hidden altar located on the second level of the forge.

6 Shadow Sunflower Blossom

Taking a Huge Flower into Combat Seems Fun

  • Weight: 16.0
  • Strength requirements: 24
  • Two-handed: 16

Another SOTE weapon, the Shadow Sunflower Blossom , is probably one of the most fun additions in the expansion. This massive dark flower, which Tarnished can use to smash enemies, is undeniably large, but what makes it stand out is how much it resembles an actual sunflower — one that anyone could pick from a field and try to wield (though with far less satisfying results). Best suited for Str/Fai builds, this colossal weapon, despite its impressive size, isn't particularly heavy, making it accessible to many characters.

Getting the Shadow Sunflower Blossom can be a daunting task, as players must defeat the hidden optional Scadutree Avatar boss in the Scadutree Base area of the Shadow Keep. Not only is locating the area tricky without a guide, but the boss itself has three full phases, each with a separate health bar.

5 Starscourge Greatsword

Iconic Paired Swords of the Strongest Demigod

  • Weight: 20.0
  • Strength requirements: 38
  • Two-handed: 25

One of the few large paired weapons in Elden Ring , the Starscourge Greatswords are an imposing choice for Str characters, though they can look somewhat ridiculous in combat. Undeniably stunning, both swords are so oversized that it's best not to question how a regular-sized Tarnished can wield them simultaneously — unless they are as massive and powerful as General Radahn himself, one of the strongest Demigods in Elden Ring lore.

To obtain these impressive paired greatswords, players must defeat Starscourge Radahn at Redmane Castle and then trade the Remembrance of the Starscourge with Enia at Roundtable Hold.

4 Fallingstar Beast Jaw

Enormous Size Coupled with Incredible Reach

  • Weight: 21.5
  • Strength requirements: 34
  • Two-handed: 23

The Fallingstar Beast Jaw was a highly popular colossal weapon in Elden Ring before its nerf, thanks to its great reach, high damage, and the Gravity Bolt unique skill, which dealt an insane amount of stance damage. Hard, heavy, and shining black, this weapon is both menacing and imposing, with a crooked tip that seems to hit quite hard (though enemy feedback might be needed to confirm). While not as oversized as some great hammers or maces, its length and distinct shape firmly place it among the biggest armaments players can wield in the game.

The Fallingstar Beast Jaw is a guaranteed drop from the optional Full-Grown Fallingstar Beast boss at the top of Mt. Gelmir. It's impressive how quickly the Tarnished managed to turn part of the beast's jaw into a deadly weapon.

3 Anvil Hammer

Well, That's an Anvil, But Not for Forging

  • Weight: 22.0
  • Strength requirements: 39
  • Two-handed : 26

The final piece from the Shadow of the Erdtree expansion on this ranking, the Anvil Hammer is among the heaviest and largest weapons in Elden Ring . Wielding a massive anvil attached to a small grip isn't something players get to do often, but those who equip it should be mindful of its very slow attack speed and high Stamina consumption. Still, the Anvil Hammer's striking design alone might be enough to convince some fans to give it a try.

The Anvil Hammer can be found in a furnace at the Ruined Forge Lava Intake, southeast of Ellac Greatbridge — a fitting location for such a unique weapon.

2 Prelate's Inferno Crozier

Oh, Smough's Hammer, What's Become of You?

  • Weight: 23.5
  • Strength requirements: 45
  • Two-handed : 30

Now, onto a couple of Elden Ring's real heavy-hitters. First up is the Prelate's Inferno Crozier , which bears a striking resemblance to the iconic Smough's Hammer from the Dark Souls series. Similar in weight and size, the Prelate's Inferno Crozier stands out with its more refined appearance, featuring a fierce crimson design and intricate roiling flame decorations. The sheer size of this hammer all but guarantees that any smaller enemy in the Tarnished's path will be flattened on hit.

The Prelate's Inferno Crozier is a guaranteed drop per playthrough from a Fire Prelate wielding it inside Fort Laiedd, located in Mt. Gelmir.

1 Giant-Crusher

An Enormous Boulder on a Stick Can Really Crush Some Giants, Apparently

  • Weight: 26.5
  • Strength requirements: 60
  • Two-handed: 40

For fans of DS3's Ledo's Great Hammer, here comes its Elden Ring counterpart. The true champion of oversized colossal armaments in both the base game and the Shadow of the Erdtree expansion, the Giant-Crusher is the heaviest, the biggest, and has the highest Strength requirement. Designed to leave an impression, this massive boulder on a stick is surprisingly practical in combat, especially with its devastating charged heavy attack. While Tarnished can technically equip two of them at once, that's probably best left as a thought experiment rather than an actual combat build.

Interestingly, the Giant-Crusher is surprisingly easy to obtain, considering its sheer uniqueness in every department. Players can simply loot it from a carriage chest in Altus Plateau, directly south of the Outer Wall Phantom Tree Site of Grace.

item.title: Marvel Rivals: 8 Rarest Skins
item.description:
Marvel Rivals continues to thrill players with its exciting roster of characters in a 6v6 setting across a multitude of maps and their objectives, but it also continues to impress thanks to its range of cosmetics and costumes that these iconic heroes and villains can wear. While there are some amazing costumes in Marvel Rivals , there are also some immensely rare ones that some players don’t have, and even fewer have ever seen.

The rarest skins in Marvel Rivals showcase a loyalty to the game like no other, and a commitment that showcases the legendary status of a veteran by owning these skins that can be obtained through no other methods except for finding a way to go back in time.

8 Scarlet Witch – White Witch

A Closed Alpha Exclusive

  • How to Get: Exclusive to Closed Alpha players
  • First Appearance: X-Men: The Trials of Magneto (2021) #4

When Marvel Rivals was first announced, some mistook it for a mere Overwatch 2 clone, and how mistaken they were. Marvel Rivals confidently released a sign-up for a Closed Alpha testing, and those lucky enough to get in were able to play as a small roster of characters back in May of 2024, but only for PC players.

Considering the small selection of Closed Alpha players, not many got to experience Marvel Rivals , especially with the player base being exclusive to PC. This means that only a select few were able to get their hands on the White Witch outfit for Scarlet Witch, showcasing a snowy white and crimson red aesthetic for the witch.

7 Iron Man – Armor Model 42

A Suit of Armor Unlocked with a Code

  • How to Get: Enter the promo code: nwarh4k3xqy
  • First Appearance: Iron Man (2012) #1

The Armor Model 42 costume for Iron Man wasn’t always rare, and in fact, it was one of the easiest free skins that players could get. All they needed to do was enter a promo code into the store to receive this skin for free, but for some players, they might have never known this until it was already too late.

While this promo code was active from December 6, 2024, it has since expired as of March 5, 2025, meaning those who play Iron Man and enjoy the sleek design of this black and gold suit are out of luck, and will have to choose from his other costumes instead.

6 Magneto – Will of Galacta

Represent Galacta’s Colors with this Mighty Mutant

  • How to Get: Twitch Drop for Amazon Prime account owners for Season 0
  • Featured in: Marvel Rivals Season 0

Magneto also has a few skins, and while this aged Mutant might be graying in a few areas, he can certainly stay fashionable with these bright colors attributed to the Will of Galacta skin. However, this isn’t something players can do anymore, as this was reserved for Season 0 of Marvel Rivals , the origin point for many who started playing the game when it released in December of 2024.

Those without Twitch Prime were unable to grab the Twitch Drop that released this free skin, providing Magneto with a snazzy new outfit that would adorn him with purples, indigos, and turquois colors to make him stand out.

5 Thor – Reborn from Ragnarok

A Younger Thor Debuts in Midnight Features

  • How to Get: Midnight Features Event
  • Featured in: Thor (2007) #1

Thor’s appearance in Marvel Rivals shows a multiverse variant, one who has been aged through battle and time. Thor’s graying hair and luscious hair show how long he has been the God of Thunder, but for those who prefer a more classic look, they could have earned themselves a free skin with the Reborn from Ragnarok outfit, providing a youthful appearance to this Avenger.

Thor’s Reborn from Ragnarok skin was his first youthful and clean-shaven outfit from the comics where he was just the God of Thunder and nothing else, but it was also a skin that could only be earned by completing all challenges in the Midnight Features Event back in January of 2025, an event that some might have missed, and others would have found the objectives too hard to complete.

4 Black Widow – Mrs. Barnes

A Widow of the Wild West

  • How to Get: Galacta’s Cosmic Adventure Event from Season 1
  • Featured in: 1872 (2015) #2

Black Widow might not be everyone’s favorite Duelist in Marvel Rivals , but it’s hard not to want to main her with the Mrs. Barnes skin, which provides this lethal assassin with the outfit of an outlaw. Mrs. Barnes’ cowgirl outfit embodies the Wild West with her wide-brimmed black hat and elk fur jacket, and spats, but many players may have missed this skin.

Since its exclusive release in early March of 2025, players had to complete objectives in Marvel Rivals to spin a dice on Galacta’s Cosmetic Adventure board to try and get the skin. However, most players might have missed this Event board due to the fact that there were two events at once, and it wasn’t very clear in-game that this was even a thing.

3 Spider-Man – Scarlet Spider

Turn Peter Parker into Kaine Parker for PlayStation Users

  • How to Get: Exclusive to PlayStation players
  • Featured in: Scarlet Spider (2011) #1

For those who play on Xbox or PC, they will be unable to grab the Scarlet Spider skin. Since Sony owns the rights to Spider-Man, it’s not surprising that they’d want to keep their golden boy on their own consoles, which is why despite the fact that all consoles can play as Spider-Man, only those on PlayStation will have access to the Scarlet Spider outfit.

It’s a nice reward for the exclusive members on PlayStation, as the Scarlet Spider has a sleek red and black design that showcases a difference between Peter and Kaine with the harsher and more gritty colors representing a darker hero who isn’t much for quips.

2 Star-Lord – Lion’s Mane

Give Star-Lord Some Dreamy Locks with a Spring Event

  • How to Get: The Fortune & Colors Event in Season 1
  • Featured in: Marvel Rivals Season 1

The Spring Festival would celebrate the Chinese New Year in Marvel Rivals , where Star-Lord was one of three characters to receive a skin. This outfit is more noticeable than the others, leaving behind Iron Fist and Black Widow specifically because Star-Lord gets a rocking mane of hair and a cool lion mask that sees him glow upon the land.

While it’s not as poppy as his other more comic-accurate outfits, it’s still a pretty cool cosmetic set that players can no longer obtain, as the event was rather short lived at the end of January and the start of February of 2025, meaning that players will have to wait for the next annual event or hopefully a store unlock.

1 Venom – Cyan Clash

A Marvel vs. Capcom-Inspired Look for Closed Beta Players

  • How to Get: Exclusive to Closed Beta players
  • Featured in: Marvel vs. Capcom 2

After the Closed Alpha provided players with the White Witch cosmetic for Scarlet Witch, players who were also lucky enough to get access to the Closed Beta would be granted the Cyan Clash skin for Venom, which provides this slimy Symbiote with a beautiful, striking cyan color instead of his regular black or navy blue.

The Closed Beta for Marvel Rivals occurred across PS5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC from July 23 to August 5, and while more people were able to get into this one than the Closed Alpha, the Cyan Clash Venom skin is still an often rare rarity, despite its popularity.

item.title: Roblox: Hollow Era Codes (April 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Hollow Era Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Hollow Era
  • How to Get More Hollow Era Codes

Hollow Era is an adventure RPG based on the Bleach anime with an open world, a bunch of quests, and enemies to defeat. Here, as in other Roblox games inspired by Bleach , you can develop as both Hollow monsters and Quincy humans, it's up to you.

Hollow Era is a grind-based game, so you'll have to spend a lot of time accumulating various resources and currency. But, you can also redeem Hollow Era codes that will bring you generous bonuses in a matter of seconds, which will save you a lot of time.

Updated April 5, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Several codes are currently available, offering valuable rewards like Cash and a Hair Color Reroll Orb. These bonuses can help enhance your experience and give you a boost in the game. Make sure to claim them while they are still available. Keep checking back for more updates and rewards in the future.

All Hollow Era Codes

Working Hollow Era Codes

  • FOLLOWMOYUTOKUN - Redeem this code to get 5,000 Cash. (NEW)
  • 2MVISITS - Redeem this code to get 10,000 Cash.
  • 30KLIKES - Redeem this code to get 10,000 Cash.
  • 20KFAVORITES - Redeem this code to get 10,000 Cash.
  • HAIRCOLOR - Redeem this code to get Hair Color Reroll Orb.

Expired Hollow Era Codes

  • 15KLIKES - Redeem this code to get 10,000 Cash.
  • SORRYFORSHUTDOWNSFIXEDFR - Redeem this code to get SP Reset.
  • 1MVISITS - Redeem this code to get 10,000 Cash.
  • 20KMEMBERS - Redeem this code to get 10,000 Cash.
  • 10KLIKES - Redeem this code to get 10,000 Cash.
  • SORRYFORSHUTDOWNS - Redeem this code to get a Skill Tree Reset.
  • 5KLIKES - Redeem this code to get 10,000 Cash.
  • SORRYFORSHUTDOWN2 - Redeem this code to get 5,000 Cash.
  • 2500LIKES - Redeem this code to get 15,000 Cash.
  • 100KVISITS - Redeem this code to get 10,000 Cash.
  • SORRYM1EXPLOITINGBUG - Redeem this code to get three Weapon Reroll Orbs.
  • 4KMEMBERS - Redeem this code to get Free Rewards.
  • 500LIKES - Redeem this code to get 10,000 Cash.
  • RELEASE - Redeem this code to get 20,000 Cash.

Redeeming Hollow Era codes will be especially useful if you have just started playing or have a lack of resources. The whole process will take you a few minutes, and the rewards you will receive are definitely worth the effort, so hurry up.

How to Redeem Codes for Hollow Era

You can redeem Hollow Era codes as soon as you appear on the server after creating a character profile. Here's a detailed guide on what to do in this Roblox game so you don't have to waste time figuring it out on your own:

  • Launch Hollow Era .
  • After launching the game, click on the slot of the character you are playing on the start screen.
  • This will take you to the main menu. Here, click on the Play button to spawn on the server.
  • Once you're on the server, pay attention to the top left corner of the screen. Here, among other buttons, interact with the one with three parallel lines on the icon.
  • This will open the menu. There will be several buttons placed in a row. Among them, interact with the fourth one.
  • By doing so, you will open the redemption menu. There will be an input field where you need to enter one of the codes from the list above.
  • Next and last, press the Enter key to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, you will see a “Code Redeemed” notification above the redemption menu and the rewards will be credited to your account.

How to Get More Hollow Era Codes

The developers of Hollow Era often share new Roblox codes, and you can find them all on the official pages of the game. Carefully monitor the announcement posts, as this is where codes are usually shared, or find a special section for them:

  • Official Hollow Era Roblox group.
  • Official Hollow Era Discord server.
  • Official Hollow Era X account.

item.title: Warframe Codes (April 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Warframe Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Warframe
  • Warframe Tips and Tricks
  • The Best Shooting Games Like Warframe
  • About the Warframe Developers

Warframe is a free-to-play sci-fi action game. It actually feels like the developers worked really hard on the game, as they have thought of many features, including customization items. Below are plenty of Warframe codes for freebies as Glyphs skins and others.

Updated April 5, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: There are a lot of glyphs available in Warframe , each offering a unique design to personalize your in-game profile. These rewards don't provide any gameplay advantages but are a fun way to express your style and preferences. The available codes are updated from time to time, so it's worth keeping an eye on them. Stay tuned for more additions in the future and be sure to check back for the latest updates on new freebies.

Warframe Codes

Below, fans will find all the codes for Warframe, including a lot of Glyph codes. In the game, Glyphs are special images that players can use to personalize their profile or to distribute in the game. Glyphs can be placed on certain surfaces in the game, such as the walls of a player's base, or used as a profile picture.

Codes Checked on April 5 , 2025.

All Active Warframe Codes

  • PARVOS - Enter this code to claim Golden Hand Decoration.

How to Redeem Codes in Warframe

The process of redeeming codes is not as easy as one would expect since it is different from most other games. Therefore, if players have any difficulties, the step-by-step instructions below will help them:

  • First, visit the official promo code page on the Warframe website.
  • Then, players need to log in to their Warframe account.
  • Afterward, they should enter or copy the above-mentioned code in the Promo Code field.
  • To redeem the code, click the Submit Code button.

Warframe Tips and Tricks

  • Platinum Strategy: Invest the initial 50 platinum wisely, focusing on weapon and Warframe slots for efficient gear management.
  • Mastery Rank: Increase Mastery Rank by leveling gear and completing Mastery Tests.
  • Star Chart Priority: Systematically conquer Star Chart missions before venturing into open-world areas for better rewards later on.
  • Trading Tactics: Engage in trading when a platinum discount is available, and rely on Warframe Market for fair transactions, avoiding trade chat as a beginner.
  • Nightwave Rewards: Participate in Nightwave challenges for valuable items and rank advancement.
  • Syndicate Support: Join syndicates for passive reputation gains and rewards.
  • Endo Management: Spend Endo wisely, choosing essential mods over others.
  • Premium Assistance: Consider premium boosts for faster progression, especially if time is limited.

About the Warframe Developers

Warframe was created by the developers from Digital Extremes. This Canadian team has been making games since 1993 and has more than 200 workers. Here are some of their titles:

  • Unreal Tournament
  • Epic Pinball
  • Dark Sector
  • The Darkness II
  • Soulframe
